localize.text: To the new manager: I’ve heard that you are a very valuable asset to the corporation, contributing greatly to the prosperity of our company. I ask that you please keep up the good work with your capable assistant, Angela. You will not find me in this place at the moment, but I believe we will be able to come face to face soon. Lobotomy Corporation will never forget your devotion and effort. I look forward to meeting with you. Kind regards, A, CEO of Lobotomy Corporation.
To the new manager:
I’ve heard that you are a very valuable asset to the corporation, contributing greatly to the prosperity of our company.
I ask that you please keep up the good work with your capable assistant, Angela.
You will not find me in this place at the moment, but I believe we will be able to come face to face soon.
Lobotomy Corporation will never forget your earnest devotion and effort.
I look forward to meeting with you. Kind regards, A, CEO of Lobotomy Corporation.
You’ve received a document written by A himself?
Perhaps you’re being recognized now.
A is on a rather long journey currently.
As all journeys have to end, the final destination will be home; this place.
Sometimes, I imagine myself on a journey too.
Have you ever taken a trip somewhere?
If I were to ever leave this place, traveling is the first thing I would want to do.
Perhaps human life in itself is one long journey?
Accumulating memories while looking at a world I have never seen before.
In fact, they say preparing for a trip is a rare luxury nowadays.
I’d be able to walk around as much as possible, taking in the scenery as if I were capturing a million photos.
Could this moment be a part of your journey as well?
The day still lies cold, but we know that the winter frost is almost over.
Can you see the flowers budding up through the snow?
This winter was much colder than usual.
However, the end of winter does not necessarily mean that spring is coming.
